message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR

Reasoning: 
1. cs.CL (Computation and Language): This paper proposes new methods to learn Chinese word representations, which is a common topic in the field of natural language processing (NLP) and falls under the scope of cs.CL.
2. cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition): The paper uses convolutional auto-encoder (convAE) to learn glyph features from the bitmaps of characters, which is a common technique in computer vision and falls under the scope of cs.CV.
3. cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper proposes models that enhance word representations using character glyphs, which involves machine learning techniques and falls under the scope of cs.LG.
4. cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The paper proposes new methods to improve Chinese word representations, which is a common topic in the field of AI and falls under the scope of cs.AI.
5. cs.IR (Information Retrieval): The paper created several evaluation datasets in traditional Chinese, which can be used for information retrieval tasks and falls under the scope of cs.IR.
